abstract: Immigration officials say San Francisco police should have turned Francisco Sanchez, suspect in killing of Kathryn Steinle, over to them for deportation instead of releasing him.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested in the shooting death of a woman at a San Francisco tourist spot, has seven felony convictions and was deported five times, the United States said.

headline.main: California: Suspect in Killing Had Been Deported
headline.print_headline: California: Suspect in Killing Had Been Deported
